00105 template <class TYPE>
00106 inline void 
00107  AST_FILE_IO::registerAttribute ( ) 
00108    { 
00109       std::string name = TYPE().attribute_class_name();
00110       if ( registeredAttributes.find ( name ) == registeredAttributes.end() )
00111          { 
00112            registeredAttributes[name] = (CONSTRUCTOR)(&TYPE::constructor) ;
00113          }
00114    }
00115 
00116 inline const std::map <std::string, AST_FILE_IO::CONSTRUCTOR>& 
00117  AST_FILE_IO::getRegisteredAttributes ( )
00118    {
00119      return registeredAttributes; 
00120    }
